en: A shop had 525 items. After selling 319, 4 helpers shared the rest equally. How many items did each helper get?
zh: 商店有 525 件物品，卖出 319 件后，剩下的由 4 个人平均分。每人分到多少件？

en: The time is 9:35. What time will it be after 15 minutes?
zh: 现在是 9:35，再过 15 分钟是几点？
